sources.title: Latest imported feed items on ArmchairCelts

articles.description: Aaron Hickey’s incredible £19m move to Brentford looks like an eye-opener for Italian football.  Bologna paid around 10% of that for the Scotland international two years earlier.  Now Hibs have accepted a £3m bid from Hellas Verona for Josh Doig, while Aberdeen have accepted a bid for the same money for Lewis Ferguson.  Scottish players of [...]
articles.title: New Money in Scottish football

articles.description:
Celtic will play their third pre-season friendly on Wednesday night, celebrating  Banik Ostrava’s 100th anniversary. A decent crowd is expected for the match, with the opposition’s section designated to their ultra’s sold out. It’s the halfway mark for Celtic’s pre-season, with three games left to play after Wednesday, two of which will be at Celtic […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic v Banik Ostrava; How to Watch

articles.description: There are naysayers who claim that Celtic’s footprint in Asia is still virtually non-existent. They point to the number of footballers from that continent who play regularly in the top five leagues. It’s as if it hasn’t dawned on them that we can’t fail to have a growing presence there, due to having four players […]
articles.title: Celtic Should Be Looking At World Domination. A Japanese Tour Is A Good Start.

articles.description: CELTIC are heading to the Far East next year as they consolidate their Japanese connection, a move first mooted by CQN last week. Ange Postecoglou has swooped on the J-League four times since arriving as Hoops manager from Yokomhama F Marinos in June last year. Kyogo Furuhashi was first to join up a year ago [...]
articles.title: CELTIC’S FAR EASTERN PROMISE

articles.description: Fran Alonso gave his first interview of the new season at the Celtic FC Women warm weather training base in Gran Canaria yesterday and was enthusiastic as ever as he looks forward to the new season looking to make yet more history for his Celtic side that the support is certainly falling in love with Read More
articles.title: Alonso’s Treble Target but still needs a summer recruitment drive

articles.description:
It was hinted that former Celtic defender Emilio Izaguirre had retired from professional football but it has now been confirmed as he has been appointed to the role of new sports director at Olancho FC [Daily Record].  The 36-year old was released at the end of the season by Marathon after a knee operation with […]
Source
articles.title: Former Celtic Hero Retires: Takes Up New Role

articles.description: Celtic, usually known as Celtic Football Club (Celtic FC), is a giant soccer team from Glasgow, Scotland. Celtic FC shares a fierce rivalry with the down-river theRangers, who are considered to be sectarian. Their supporters hatred of Celtic FC (and its supporters) is a result of Celtic’s strong links to Ireland and being widely supported Read More
articles.title: A Brief History of Celtic Football Club

articles.description:
It has been reported that English side Portsmouth are interested in a move for former Celtic striker Jonathan Afolabi [Hampshire Live].  Afolabi made the trip north to Glasgow from premier league side Southampton in late August 2019 just as the quest for 9 in a row was beginning. It was hoped that the Republic of […]
Source
articles.title: Former Celtic striker poised for move south – Report

articles.description:
It has been revealed that there are plans in place for the Hoops to visit Japan in summer 2023 during pre-season [Sponichi Annex].  When Kyogo Furuhashi arrived at the club last summer Celtic’s multimedia and marketing team set up a separate twitter account which has been a great success [@CelticFCJPN] gaining over 60,000 followers with […]
Source
articles.title: Celtic Set for Money Spinning Japan Tour

articles.description:
During Celtic’s 3-3 draw with Rapid Vienna at the weekend, two players which stood out where David Turnbull and Kyogo Furuhashi with the former Motherwell midfielder heaping praise on his Celtic teammate.  Both of these players played an integral role during the first part of the season under Ange Postecoglou with it being easy to […]
Source
articles.title: Turnbull Singles Our Celtic’s Star Man

articles.description: TOMMY BURNS returned to his beloved Celtic as manager EXACTLY twenty-eight years ago today. It was an emotional and controversial homecoming for the Hoops legend as he left Kilmarnock in acrimonious circumstances to take over from the sacked Lou Macari. Celtic were accused of ‘tapping’ the boss while he was in charge at the Ayrshire [...]
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: WELCOME BACK TO CELTIC: THE TOMMY BURNS STORY (Part One)

articles.description: Matt O’Riley opened his account for the season with a neat finish in the opening stages to give Celtic the lad against Rapid Vienna on Saturday evening. And the January signing from MK Dons has every reason to look forward to the new season after a dream start to his time at Paradise saw him Read More
articles.title: “I’m at a massive club and they play the football I want to play,” Matt O’Riley

articles.description: DAVID TURNBULL has revealed he “loves playing alongside” Kyogo Furuhashi. However, the Celtic midfielder also admitted the Japanese striker may just be too quick for his team-mates to read his intentions. Kyogo, who arrived in a £4.6million deal from J-League side Vissel Kobe a year ago, netted 20 goals in an injury-interrupted season where he [...]
articles.title: THE JOY BHOY WHO ‘LOVES PLAYING ALONGSIDE’ KYOGO

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur manager Antonio Conte has said that seeing Fraser Forster perform for Celtic prompted him to move for the former England Internationalist this summer. The 34-year-old joined on a free transfer after his deal with Southampton expired. The shrewd Conte was keen to offer some back-up to push Hugo Lloris and he saw those qualities Read More
articles.title: Spurs manager says watching Celtic performance prompted transfer move

articles.description: After a midweek win over St Mirren at Celtic Park last season, just as the controversy about theRangers participation in the Sydney Cup got underway, The Celtic Star asked Ange Postecoglou at the post-match media conference if Celtic were considering adding a few matches in Japan while they were in that part of the World Read More
articles.title: Celtic planning to tour Japan next summer
